Text: SDL Intl Followup Cc Hello Mr Lay and Mr McConnell As per my email to you on the th I do hope you or someone from your staff has had a chance to visit the SDL International website to review the depth and breadth of our Translation and Localization Services and Products In case that message has been deleted here is the URL again Id appreciate the opportunity to meet with any appropriate Enron team members at their earliest convenience to discuss Enrons priorities and needs for your Global Market strategies and thus how we at SDL International can be an integral resource for meeting those targets I will be setting up my November trip into Houston very soon and hope to include Enron on my itinerary Sincerely Brent Romero SDL International Brazos Suite Austin TX Office Direct email

SDL International Cc Hello Mr Lay In light of Enrons incredible success I am afraid I have been remiss in not introducing myself and SDL International to you sooner SDL International is a leading globalization solutions provider among the top four worldwide Our unique combination of products and services provide our customers with the complete solution With full time employees and offices throughout the USA Asia and Europe currently countries SDL provides globalization solutions with stateoftheart technology and a full range of inhouse translation services Our clients whose loyalty speaks volumes include multinational companies such as Adobe Bayer Corel Disney eBay Goodyear Kodak Microsoft Phillips Seagate Comand many more Globalization solutions have now moved beyond simple translation services to encompass product solutions including software products such as SDLWebFlow and SDLX which assist organizations to update their multilingual web sites quickly and efficiently Another exciting product is our Enterprise Translation Server ETS ETS is the realtime translation solution wherever your company needs crosslanguage capabilities including email instant messaging intranets and websites To learn more visit our web site Please call me with any questions or to schedule a meeting at otherwise I will touch base with you next Tuesday the th And please feel free to forward this message to any of your colleagues who may have an interest We at SDL hope to soon be a valued partner and resource for you and Enron Best Regards Brent Romero SDL International Brazos Suite Austin TX Office Direct email
